EVENT NAME: Abaton, un ciclo sobre lugares imaginarios
EVENT DESCRIPTION:
[CAST]
La Blueproject Foundation presenta "Abaton", un ciclo en torno a la idea de lugar imaginario que reúne diferentes propuestas artísticas y que acogerá Il Salotto del 4 de mayo al 7 de junio de 2018. Este ciclo contará de manera permanente con la instalación sonora "Chijikinkutsu", del artista japonés Nelo Akamatsu, que convivirá con las otras actividades como performances, proyección de vídeos de artistas y largometrajes, una sesión literaria y una performance audiovisual.

[ENG]

The Blueproject Foundation presents "Abaton", a cycle around the idea of imaginary places that brings together different artistic proposals and which will be hosted at Il Salotto from May 4 to June 7, 2018. This cycle will have a permanent sound installation called "Chijikinkutsu", by the Japanese artist Nelo Akamatsu, who will live together with other activities such as performances, video projections of artists and feature films, a literary session and an audovisual performance.
